sentences.en: "Life," said Dr Holly piously, "is the only wealth, and I gave you life."
sentences.cn: 霍利医生装模作样地说：“生命是唯一的财富，而我给了你生命。”

sentences.en: A singer on the country music station was singing a lament for the late, great Buddy Holly.
sentences.cn: 乡村音乐电台中，一位歌手正演唱歌曲哀悼已故的伟大音乐人巴迪·霍利。

sentences.en: Holly has high tearing resistance and is excellent for trailing edges.
sentences.cn: 冬青属的木才具有高抗断裂强度,是制作后缘的理想材料.

sentences.en: Holly showed us a small white stuffed bear named Lucy.
sentences.cn: Holly展示给我们一只名字叫Lucy的白色的小毛绒熊.

sentences.en: Holly was adept at keeping things to herself , and all had seemed to go quite well.
sentences.cn: 好丽素来能够不露声色, 所以表面上一切还是处得很好.

sentences.en: Holly, like ivy and mistletoe, is an evergreen.
sentences.cn: 冬青和常春藤、槲寄生一样，都是常绿植物。

sentences.en: I recently acquired some wood from a holly tree.
sentences.cn: 最近我从一棵冬青树上弄了些木料。

sentences.en: Julie and Holly come over Thursdays for our weekly bake fest.
sentences.cn: 朱莉和霍莉星期四都回来吃早餐.

sentences.en: People often decorate their houses with holly at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 人们总是在圣诞节时用冬青来装饰房屋.

sentences.en: Scott thought it was a secret treasure; Holly thought a ghost lived inside.
sentences.cn: 司各持以为是个密藏的珍宝, 荷里以为里头住了个精灵.

sentences.en: She came out with two packages wrapped in holly-sprigged paper.
sentences.cn: 她抱着两个用带有冬青枝叶图案的纸包装的盒子走了出来。

sentences.en: The church was decked with holly for the holiday season.
sentences.cn: 教堂以冬青树枝装饰以迎接圣诞节。

sentences.en: The hall was decked with holly for the Christmas.
sentences.cn: 大厅装饰着冬青树枝迎接圣诞节。

sentences.en: The room was lavishly decorated with tinsel and holly.
sentences.cn: 房间用了大量的金属箔和冬青枝装饰,十分奢华.

trans.tran_cn: 冬青（常绿灌木，叶尖而硬，有光泽，冬季结红色浆果），（用作圣诞节饰物的）冬青树枝，[名]霍莉，女子名
trans.tran_en: a small tree with sharp dark green leaves and red berries (  berry  ), or the leaves and berries of this tree, used as a decoration at Christmas
